mean_en: the process of making a system, methods, etc. more modern and more suitable for use at the present time
sentence: As many updated equipments are introduced, offices have witnessed the development of modernization.
sentence_trans: 随着新兴设备的引入，办公场所的现代化程度也在不断提高。
word_etyma: modern现代的 ＋ ization表名词，发展过程 → modernization现代化
